refnamediv.refpurpose: Contains the text description of the last failed SAM operation.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: error Contains the text description of the last failed SAM operation on this connection. If the last operation completed successfully this property contains an empty string.

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.returnvalues;
A string containing the text description of the last error type encountered on the connection. An empty string indicates that the last operation on this connection completed successfully.
